question: I am suffering from piles. I apply Oil (herbal medicine) in the anal region. The medicine ingredient contains cow urine. ...Do I need to wash it every time before salaat? The soiled area is maybe 3-4 Cms.
answer:
QUESTION

 

I am suffering from piles. I apply Oil (herbal medicine) in the anal region. The medicine ingredient contains cow urine. I have to apply the oil thrice a day for two-three months. Some of the oil gets on the undergarments. Do I need to wash it every time before salaat? The soiled area is maybe 3-4 Cms. What if the soiled area is bigger than this?

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

It is impermissible for you to apply the herbal medication as it contains cow urine which is impure. However, if this herbal medication is known to be the only and effective medication in treating your sickness, then its usage will be permissible.

 

If there is no alternative, you may apply this herbal medication.You should use cotton wool, a piece of cloth or pad etc over the oil in order to avoid the impure medication from soiling your clothing.

 

 

 (وبول مأكول) اللحم (نجس) نجاسة مخففة، وطهره محمد (ولا يشرب) بوله (أصلا) لا للتداوي ولا لغيره عند أبي حنيفة.

فروع: اختلف في التداوي بالمحرم،وظاهر المذهب المنع كما في رضاع البحر، لكن نقل المصنف ثمة وهنا عن الحاوي: وقيل يرخص إذا علم فيه الشفاء ولم يعلم دواء آخر كما رخص الخمر للعطشان، وعليه الفتوى.

(Raddul Muhtaar, 1/210,Saeed)

(Almuheetul Burhaani,8/81)

(Fatawa Mahmudia, 18/355)

(Fatawa Hindiyyah, 5/435)

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best

Wassalāmu ῾alaykum 

Ml. Abdur Rahman Shareef,
Student Dārul Iftā
